subject: Get cash back for consolidating your Student Loans
body:
financialaid.com - Federal Rate Reduction Notification





notice#1005priority: URGENT
FEDERAL RATE REDUCTION NOTIFICATION
Under Federal Law, You have the right to receive a FREE rate reduction on 
your Federal Student Loans.  You can cut your student loan payments by 
50% or more.  This program has NO fees, NO credit checks and NO 
employment verifications guaranteed.

To learn more go to click here now.
 
Easy 10 Minute Process with E-signature
Interests Rates as low as 5.375%
Reduce monthly payments by up to 54%
Make Only One Payment a month

CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE ABOUT THIS FREE FEDERAL PROGRAM.



FinancialAid.com ? 12680 High Bluff 
        Drive, Suite 400? San Diego, CA 92130 


        Click here to unsubscribe from Financial Aid emails  




Use this link to be automatically removed from any future offers


Take me off of your email list , please write us with your removal request.  Customer Service 560- A F ST #438 Grants Pass, OR 97528.Please note: It may take up to 3 days for your name to be removed from our list.
